column5: PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE BOOKING  Our condo is located in a perfect spot to explore and enjoy Austin. We sit in the middle of Austin's eclectic East Austin bars, restaurants and shops and downtown Austin. Our favorite features are the floor to ceiling windows to enjoy the panoramic city views and the walkability of the location. You'll be short walk to Austin's 6th Street bars, Austin Convention Center, Rainey Street, and Lady Bird Lake.
column8: Conveniently Located E 6th St. Condo with a View!
